Name: Frozen Night Riding
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Rise on a Frozen Night Riding Mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Rise on a Frozen Night Riding Mount that can double-jump to travel very fast. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Autopilot is available only on Victoria Island and some other continents. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Rise on a Frozen Night Riding Mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.
